name: Chatty
loreDescription: I was once the best mercenary in the world!! Before Serila... No, master trapped my soul inside this lantern.

skillDescription.base: 50.0% chance to be granted a barrier for 2 turns after being attacked if attack causes Health to fall below 50%. Barrier strength is proportional to Attack. Can be activated once every 2 turns.
skillDescription.max: 100.0% chance to be granted a barrier for 2 turns after being attacked if attack causes Health to fall below 50%. Barrier strength is proportional to Attack. Can be activated once every 2 turns.
